turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: Lost of Wallet

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: “Hi, Officers.”

turns.speaker: bot
turns.text: Hello! How can I

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: “Good afternoon. I think I lost my wallet at the train station.”

turns.speaker: bot
turns.text: I'm sorry to hear that! Can you tell me which station and roughly what time you think you lost it?

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: “I think I lost the wallet light at 3 p.m. yesterday.”

turns.speaker: bot
turns.text: Thank you for that. We’ll note Parramatta Station at around 3 p.m. yesterday. Could you describe the wallet for me—its color, any unique features, and what items were inside?

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: “Yes, the world color is black and his parents is from the”

turns.speaker: bot
turns.text: Got it, a black wallet with some wear and tear. What kind of items were inside—like cards, ID, or anything important we should know about?

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: “Oh, yes. My student ID, my driver's license, and 1,000 cars. Yes.”

turns.speaker: bot
turns.text: Thank you for that

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: Transcript Unavailable

turns.speaker: bot
turns.text: Thanks for letting me know. We’ll file this report and check if anything matching that description has been turned in. Next step, we’ll contact you if we find anything. Could I get your contact number or email so we can reach you?

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: “Yes, my contact number is XXXXXX, and my email address is leandor, L-E-E-A-N-D-O-R, at gmail.com.”

turns.speaker: bot
turns.text: Perfect, we have your contact details. We’ll keep an eye out and let you know if your wallet is found. In the meantime, you might want to notify your bank and any relevant institutions about the lost cards. Is there anything else I can assist you with today?

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: “I just remember something that my wallet had a tiny logo with L-I-V-E-I, and it comes from the Chinese Pradas. And I remember that the tie in the 3 p.m. Palo Alto season, I remember I'm sitting on the on the chair because it's the last time I remember that I used the wallet. And then in the next morning that I can find my wallet in my bed. So I just think I might have pictures in my wallet. And the pictures is me and my boyfriends. And this is all I know the details about my lost wallet.”

turns.speaker: bot
turns.text: Thank you for all those details, that’s really helpful. We’ll note that it’s a black wallet with a "LIVEI" logo, from a Chinese brand, and it had pictures of you and your boyfriend. We’ll keep that in mind while we search. If anything comes up, we’ll reach out to you right away. I hope we can find it for you soon!

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: “Thank you, thank you.”

turns.speaker: bot
turns.text: You're very welcome! If you need any more help, just let me know. Have a great day, and fingers crossed that we find it!

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: “YouTube.”

turns.speaker: bot
turns.text: Thanks! Take care,
